paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Val30Met, including penetrance data and individual case details.

patients.phenotype: Late-onset Familial Amyloidotic Polyneuropathy with Bence Jones Proteinuria and Cardiomyopathy

individual_records.phenotype_details: hypesthesia in the hands and feet, difficulty walking, cardiac symptoms, diarrhea
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient was a 70-year-old male examined due to hypesthesia in the hands and feet, plus difficulty walking.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy.

variants.additional_notes: No population frequency or segregation data provided.
key_quotes: The genetic study was compatible with a heterozygous Val30Met-transthyretin mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data is based on the information provided in the main text.
